Class ActionSave

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.Action, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, java.io.Serializable
public class ActionSave
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction

The class to register the action "Save".
It uses some methods in the LibGUI to perform its operations.

ActionSave

public ActionSave(ToolBarWindow toolB,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String toolTip,
                  javax.swing.KeyStroke accelerator,
                  javax.swing.Icon icon)
Constructs an AbstractAction and sets additional fields.
Parameters:
toolB - the ToolBarWindow in which this action will be created.
name - the label that will be put in menus.
toolTip - the tooltip which will appear on the buttons or in the menus.
accelerator - the keyboard shortcut.
icon - the beautiful icon for the button and the menu item .
